package.name: Dango
package.long: Set of Dango-like pictures by suse@conference.jabber.ru/pendruk Dango (団子) is a Japanese dumpling made from mochiko (rice flour), related to mochi. It is often served with green tea. Dango are eaten year-round, but the different varieties are traditionally eaten in given seasons. Three to four dango are often served on a skewer.
